blogs.title: What are loops and iteration?
blogs.content: In my Full Stack journey, I explored algorithms through research, video notes, and my 'loop cheat sheet,' an essential tool for success.

blogs.title: The Big O Notation.
blogs.content: At the start of my Full-stack Software Engineering Bootcamp, I was intimidated by algorithms. Fortunately, my instructor guided me and helped me understand their concepts. As I dove deeper into the subject, I became fascinated with the intricate ways in which algorithms enhance our programming skills and enable us to improve our programâ€™s efficiency. Here are my notes on Big O Notation.

blogs.title: Creating a database using Python and SQLAlchemy.
blogs.content: SQLAlchemy is an awesome Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library that allows us to interact with databases using Python. I will provide you with my step-by-step notes on how to create a database using Python and Alchemy.

blogs.title: Mastering flask from fundamentals to advanced concepts.
blogs.content: Embarking on Flask web development unlocks versatile web application possibilities. Let's explore foundational building blocks and advanced techniques for mastery.

blogs.title: Building a full stack app with flask react mysql.
blogs.content: Creating a full-stack app is a daunting task and I remember feeling overwhelmed and lost during my first attempt. However, after putting in a lot of hard work and sleepless nights, I was eventually able to complete the assignment. As a result, I have decided to create a tutorial on how to create a full-stack app, so that others can benefit from my experience.

projects.title: NFLeague
projects.description: Developed a full-stack application using Flask, Python, and React, including database creation with SQLAlchemy.

projects.title: Candy Shop
projects.description: Designed game mechanics and user interface

projects.title: Franco Cleaning
projects.description: Developed website using React with JavaScript and Bootstrap styling

projects.title: Pianito
projects.description: Created an interactive keyboard interface with React

projects.title: MYFLIX
projects.description: I built MYFLIX, which uses Axios for movie data from the Movie DB API, Firebase for user auth, and has responsive mobile design.

projects.title: Bad Reads
projects.description: I created Badreads, a web app for book enthusiasts with an intuitive UI, search, book info, and user reviews, showcasing my JavaScript, React and web development skills.

projects.title: My Sous Chef
projects.description: Created a recipe-based website that showcases my expertise in API rendering and data fetching using JavaScript.
